entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as examining the walls and ceiling with a wand held high.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as whispering to Dumbledore and experiencing shivers due to enchantments.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story. He is mentioned by Dumbledore as having obstacles in his way.

entities.name: the cave
entities.description: A location where magic is present and enchantments can be felt. It is described as an ante-chamber and entrance hall.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Harry are together in the cave, with Dumbledore examining the walls and ceiling.
Dumbledore is inside the cave, examining its magic and enchantments.
Harry is also inside the cave, experiencing shivers due to enchantments.
Dumbledore mentions that Lord Voldemort has obstacles in his way.
